name: pyDockWEB
description: pyDockWEB is a web server for the structural prediction of protein-protein interactions. Given the 3D coordinates of two interacting proteins, pyDockWEB returns the best rigid-body docking orientations generated by FTDock (Gabb HA. et al. J Mol Biol 1997;272:106-120) and evaluated by pyDock scoring function (Cheng et al. 2007 Proteins 68, 503-515), which includes electrostatics, desolvation energy and limited van der Waals contribution.
